effect.name: Flanger
effect.description: Apply a flanging effect to the audio.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.delay
Delay
parameter.comment: Set base delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 30.

parameter.name: av.depth
Depth
parameter.comment: Set added sweep delay in milliseconds. Range from 0 to 10.

parameter.name: av.regen
Regeneration
parameter.comment: Set percentage regeneration (delayed signal feedback). Range from -95 to 95.

parameter.name: av.width
Width
parameter.comment: Set percentage of delayed signal mixed with original. Range from 0 to 100.

parameter.name: av.speed
Speed
parameter.comment: Set sweeps per second (Hz). Range from 0.1 to 10.

parameter.name: av.shape
Shape
parameter.comment: Set swept wave shape, can be triangular or sinusoidal.

parameter.name: av.phase
Phase
parameter.comment: Set swept wave percentage-shift for multi channel. Range from 0 to 100.

parameter.name: av.interp
Interpolation
parameter.comment: Set delay-line interpolation, linear or quadratic.
